# Basic demography transformation rules
TABLE,Demography,primary_key,ROOT
FIELD,record_id,int
FIELD,first_name,varchar(40)
FIELD,last_name,varchar(40)
FIELD,address,string
FIELD,telephone,char(24),phone
FIELD,email,varchar(80)
FIELD,dob,string,birthdate
FIELD,ethnicity,int
FIELD,race,checkbox
FIELD,sex,int
FIELD,height,float
FIELD,weight,float
FIELD,bbbmi,float
FIELD,comments,string
